Translation: to hear, to listen to, to ask
to put on, wear from the shoulders down
to get cloudy, to get gloomy
to get out, to put out
to take a photo, to record a video
to line up, to queue up (passive)
to line up, to set up (active)
to become, to attain, to succeed (passive)
to establish, to form, to achieve (active)
to wear on the lower body
to play an instrument with strings or keys
